alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Weber...northeastern Salt Lake...northeastern Davis...southwestern Morgan and western Summit Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms building near Centerville, or near Farmington, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, Kaysville, South Ogden, Centerville, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, South Weber, Uintah, East Canyon State Park, Emigration Canyon, Fruit Heights, Mountain Green, Portersville and Stoddard. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 321 and 325. Interstate 84 between mile markers 83 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
